info.description: A comprehensive trading journal API for tracking trades, setups, and market analysis
info.title: 100xTrader API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all notes

post.description: Create a new note for a user

get.description: Retrieve all notes for a specific user
Retrieve daily notes for a specific user
Retrieve a specific note by ID
Retrieve a list of all tags

post.description: Add a tag to an existing trade

delete.description: Remove a tag from a trade

get.description: Retrieve a specific tag by ID
Retrieve a list of all trade setups

post.description: Create a new trade setup with market analysis

get.description: Retrieve all trade setups for a specific user
Retrieve a specific trade setup by ID
Retrieve a list of trades with optional filtering by user_id, market, and include_journal

post.description: Create a new trade with optional journal entry, trade actions, and tags

get.description: Retrieve all trades for a specific user
Retrieve a specific trade with its journal, actions, tags, and screenshots

put.description: Update an existing trade with new data

delete.description: Delete a trade and all its associated data

post.description: Add a new action to an existing trade

delete.description: Remove a specific action from a trade

post.description: Update or create a journal entry for a trade
Add a screenshot to a trade journal

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users in the system

post.description: Create a new user account with name, email, and optional phone
Sign in a user with email

get.description: Retrieve a specific user by their ID
Check if the API service is healthy and database is accessible

trade_id.description: Optional when embedded in trade creation
